title: Impressionism, Fashion, and Modernity
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting—and ever-fashionable—world of 19th-century Paris. Experience 75 masterworks by artists such as Degas, Manet, Monet, and Renoir alongside the glamorous dresses, très chic hats, and dapper suits that inspired them, and discover how truly à la mode the Impressionists were.
